channel.title: "I'm okay with being bussed" marker on unseen/cult members
channel.description: Sometimes it's expedient to bus someone who just got converted when you are their team member. But currently the rules prohibit that and they usually won't let you. However some would allow themselves to be bussed, or at least I would, so I'd like there to be some notification when you convert someone if they are okay with you bussing them ... Like if you're MM and about to get executed for no leads, you just converted someone and you need to bus them to regain credibility.

item.title: "I'm okay with being bussed" marker on unseen/cult members
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
rather than “to the account”, perhaps some kind of marker in the interface that can be toggled at any point in the day or night. Maybe 3 states to it.

IE the 3 states it can be toggled to would have the implications of

“I highly opposed being bussed”
“If you believe it is in the best interest of the side you may bus me”
“I strongly encourage you to bus me right now”
